title: couchsurfing
author: couchsurfing
created_time: November 07, 2022, 03:47:53 AMLast edit: November 07, 2022, 11:43:15 AM by couchsurfing
content: What happened:: Using trojan horse for my bitcoinScammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=323016Reference Link: Amount Scammed: Not yetPayment Method: Proof of Payment: PM/Chat Logs: Additional Notes: He is sending a trojan horse ï¼ˆthe last file he sent), guide me transfer my bitcoin to "safe system" designed by him, trying to steal my bitcoin. This guy is totally a professional scamer. or form a scamer team.His bitcointalk ID should buy from the others or form hacker, as you can see, the ID owner is a Chinese from the posts in 2014.the link he sent is a fake miner website, to track my hardware model, OS\network envirment QuoteThomas, [Oct 30, 2022 at 22:25:01]:How did you come to that,my friend?Hank, [Oct 30, 2022 at 22:27:00]:can we have a voice call, maybe more efficency?Thomas, [Oct 30, 2022 at 22:34:40]:Its hard for me to say this,but i lost my speech after a parachute jumpI developed an aphasiaIn other words,i can listen,but I cant speak or i can speak in a way that makes me feel ashamed of my speechMy daughter helps me a lotIm sorryðŸ˜”Thomas, [Oct 30, 2022 at 22:52:43]:I have more questionsWhat kind of miners are you using?What kind of wallet do you prefer for rewards?Hank, [Oct 30, 2022 at 22:56:36]:for wallet, ledger or trezor is fineThomas, [Oct 30, 2022 at 23:01:37]:I dont recommend these wallets to anyoneIts possible to break into their source code,which i recently discoveredWell,I'll tell youI m a former employee of intel,server and application securityLets keep it simple,these wallets have a chip insideWith the special equipment that any system administrator has,it can be hackedAnd i personally know of several such casesThomas, [Nov 2, 2022 at 00:28:15]:Tell me,and you take the reward for mining immediately to the purse Trezor?Hank, [Nov 2, 2022 at 01:58:03]:to the mining pool at firstThomas, [Nov 3, 2022 at 01:26:30]:Hello,my friendI've picked up a few models of minersWhich one would you recommend as the best solution in terms of value for money?https://yip.su/2y4J74https://yip.su/2yRG74Hank, [Nov 3, 2022 at 01:28:23]:the 2nd oneyour eletricity is free, just choose the cheapest onecheapest for each TH/shttps://compassmining.io/hardwareyou can choose from this listThomas, [Nov 3, 2022 at 01:41:23 (Nov 3, 2022 at 02:26:08)]:Thanks for ur help,my friendIn return,i want to help you tooI want to set you up a totally secure system for storing bitcoinTwo years ago,the nigerian government paid me $40k for thisWhat do you say?Thomas, [Nov 3, 2022 at 02:23:48]:i ll ask you a series of questions1)Is there a separate laptop?If not,we will set up the system from scratch as a second system on the computerThe main thing is that it's windowsthere's a huge amount of privacy settings and it's not as closed as Apple's,for example2) We will set up a wallet ElectrumYou will not need to download 300Gb of entire blockchainWill it be a problem?3) Do you use proxy?4) Do you use antivirus?5)Does anyone know your seed phrase or private key except you?6)What time is convenient for you to give it your attention?Write the date and timeThomas, [Nov 4, 2022 at 01:31:43]:The following algorithm of actions:1)Press win+r2)Enter the "services.msc" command3)Disable services:ASP.NET State ServiceNet.Tcp Listener AdapterNet.Tcp Port Sharing ServiceKtmRm Diagnostics Tracking ServiceIf you don't understand,write right away

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Can you explain what the hell happened to you without us having to click on every link? A summary would be nice, apart from the alleged evidence.Quote from: couchsurfing on November 07, 2022, 03:47:53 AMI don't know why my images can not be shown directllyYou can't post images because you are a newbie, consider buying a copper membership if you are very interested, although as you have merits, if you continue writing in the forum you will rank up soon.Well, explain yourself better because I see you are talking about a potential scam and not someone who has already scammed you for a certain amount.

comments.body: Quote from: couchsurfing on November 07, 2022, 03:47:53 AMI don't know why my images can not be shown directllyYou have to be at least Jr Member rank in order for your images to be shown. I can help with that by quoting those, so people can see the evidence but you should have set them in the chronological order. And yes, Poker Player Â is right, you should write what exactly happen here instead posting bunch of screenshots and letting people figure it out by themselves.Quote from: couchsurfing on November 07, 2022, 03:47:53 AMPM/Chat Logs: Additional Notes:

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: What's the background story here anyways, and why did this person contact you?First there is talk about removing spyware from computers. After that, there is a discussion about mining. And lastly, the alleged scammer was supposed to set up some "ultra-safe" storage system for your crypto holdings. Â  Don't trust random people on the internet for no apparent reason. Did you run any of the files the person sent you or did you just scan them for malware?I think it's safe to assume that your device is compromised and you should think about formatting your OS and moving whatever coins you have from the device that received the infected files.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: couchsurfing on November 07, 2022, 08:26:52 AMthank you. I've edit post and correct order. of screenshot.Since you edited your post, I edited my reply as well. This member's story stinks right from the beginning: first he told you that his brother is director of power plant lol (so I guess he has free eletricity?), and then moves on to some bullshit story about Nigerian government paying him $40k for his system for securing bitcoin. For now I left him a negative feedback and will wait a little for his response before continue with flag.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: couchsurfing on November 07, 2022, 03:47:53 AMthe link he sent is a fake miner website, to track my hardware model, OS\network envirment This is the "benefit" of doing this kind of things privately, on telegram, instead of publicly, on the forum.If done publicly, others could have been seeing the links and the story and tell you from start that it all stinks.PS. Scammers were around in 2014 too. Even more, since then the account could have easily change hands too (hack, selling, ...); tagging it now.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: auy on November 07, 2022, 03:25:26 PMContact me if you don't believe meAnyone can write to me in private messagesBut no need to talk dirty about me and spoil my reputation,based on what this man tells youBuddy, that's what happens when you move conversation from bitcointalk PM to Telegram and then share suspicious files, while talking nonsense. First of all, it doesn't make much sense to me that someone who is in crypto mining since 2014 (according to your post history, but I think that account may have changed hands sometimes between 2014-2018) sends unsolicited PMs to other people, asking some basic questions. 2nd, just 6 months ago you were asking others how to protect your crypto wallet, and now suddenly you are an ex Intel computer expert that sold "secure system for storing bitcoin" to Nigerian government for $40k. Also, your story how Ledger and Trezor are not safe as any system administrator can easily hack them is another bs.
